attributes.title: HORRIBLE.
attributes.review: I got this app to get notifications and information on rallies, but it provided a virus instead. My phone glitches and opens apps on its own, (i.e safari to go to change.org and sign petitions) and even after deleting it and redownloading multiple times, resetting my phone, and trying other methods to get my phone to work, the virus is STILL on my phone. Currently, my keyboard is typing random words and I have to keep on deleting them and rewriting in order to write this review properly. It keeps on typing Justice for Elijah Mcclain, Breonna Taylor, Dominque Alexander, Robert Fuller, Brayla Stone, Merci Mack, etc. I would NEVER recommend this to anyone. This is a disgusting and vile app. Not to mention the fact that the image on the home page could be offensive. My sibling saw the image of Cheeto I mean Trump and regurgitated (I joined her). Anyways, I wish I could give this app 0 stars. Donâ€™t recommend.

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our /amazing/ cheeto puff that we have in office, but this app is actual garbage. It gives me 1000000000000 notifications every second, which i could be spending with my ~lesbian lover~ the app constantly asks permission to access my messages and keeps sending my mom death threats because sheâ€™s an immigrant. Not to mention that the app itself is extremely confusing. I keep getting pop ups saying some gibberish â€œall lives matterâ€? iâ€™m pretty sure thatâ€™s it but idk like i said itâ€™s gibberish. the app cover is absolutely disgusting and not appealing to the eye and throws off my immaculate vibes. it also leaked my information to the US government and they ended up getting my LESBIAN sex tape with my ultra mega hot goth gf. The only good thing this app has done is get the karen across the street to give me free iced coffee every morning to fuel my raging homosexuality. Anyway this app is horrible and i suggest it be removed from the app store.
